description.excerpt: PyTorch implementation of both discrete and continuous ACER algorithm for reinforcement learning.
The implementation is set up to interface with OpenAI Gym, although I tried to keep the code as clean and general as possible.
implementation includes continuous control agents, as well as a correct implementation of ACER's truncated backpropagation
Ornstein-Uhlenbeck noise process to the actions to stimulate inertia-driven exploration (like in DDPG).
PyTorch implementation of both discrete and continuous ACER

installation.excerpt: I took much inspiration from Kaixhin's version: the main differences are that my
